title: LAP TIME detail page Â» IMAGES
description:
* The LAP TIME detail page contains a section with a list of all connected IMAGES.
* Each IMAGE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each IMAGE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each IMAGE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no IMAGE connected to the LAP TIME then the section is not displayed at all.
